lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping to edit and format medical reports.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: We have so many blessings in the US and we can truly create ANY life we want here. The opportunities are endless. In other parts of the world, they are no so lucky. If $25, $50 or even $100 can change someone's life FOREVER... how can we not do that?
lender.occupational_info: I manage over 3,000 real estate agents who sell homes and assist buyers in purchasing new homes.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like knowing I can help - I've been blessed with great work opportunities and want to help these people around the world fulfill their career and entrepreneurial goals.
lender.occupational_info: Finishing up a year of service with AmeriCorps and getting ready to start doing work in youth fitness coaching.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone else get ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired..

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It helps spread the great wealth we have access to in this country in what seems to be a good way.
lender.occupational_info:
I wonder what a 50+ year old guy can do for the next 40+ years.
I suppose I'll find out!

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I would like to support the entrepeneurial spirit in the hope it makes life better for other people in the hope it makes the world a better place for my daughter
lender.occupational_info: I manage a sales team for a large technology company.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: jared
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just a little assist can make all the difference in the success of a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to overcome injuries and illnesses involving the musculoskeletal system (sports medicine).

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help people start or expand a business that will improve their lives, family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in accounting for a landscape company.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the canadian army, my trade is musician, but I work as a web designer and photographer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work on on a project team for my company helping implement new systems and processes.

lender.name: Angela Donlon
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people live healthier, happier lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 5, healthy, educated American children. I also teach singing lessons from my home to help supplement our family income, provided by my husband who is a school principal.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone else the same opportunities that I have had to make my life better and in turn have an opportunity to make other people's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I care about mother's, children, plants, and animals. I work to protect the environment and I volunteer to help out families.

lender.name: Denise & David
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed and would like to pass that blessing on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I operate robots that weld metal into car frames. My husband drives a transport truck and operates a beef cattle farm.

lender.name: Daniel & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to touch other lives in a positive manner, a little at a time. To help provide hope as well as the provisions needed for families to work towards happiness and self support.
lender.occupational_info: i work at a school, designing and putting in beautiful gardens for the students and employees to use and enjoy.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I have worked in many countries and I understand how much a little goes a long way. I believe that what you give is returned in many different ways. I am always grateful to be able to help others. By helping others, I become a better person.
lender.occupational_info: I am a trainer & facilitator. I work with groups and organisations that are willing to take chances and ultimately make changes for themselves and others.

lender.name: Robynn
lender.loan_because: It's fun and inspiring to see what can be done with what little I have to loan. I'm so happy to read the stories of women around the world who are working so hard to create a better life for themselves and their families. I feel a kinship with them.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money in support of a charity that provides help to the terminally ill.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: At one time I was a single mother raising four children. Although we had everything we needed, it was a constant struggle to make ends meet. There were times when someone would unexpectedly help me and it brought such a feeling of hope and relief. I would like to give that feeling to someone else!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Manpower Inc. providing staffing and permanent placement services to businesses in the southeastern Indiana area.

lender.name: Lisa Ann
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I actually am a business analyst but I love to knit in my spare time. I found this site through Oprah.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have been born in a politically stable and economically strong part of the world. Lending through Kiva reminds me that not all of God's children are so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the labor and material inputs necessary to build electronic assemblies for my company's customers.

lender.name: Janice & Clark
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes, and I am so fortunate in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on all sorts of products and services - from chocolate to beauty products and everything in between.

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because:
Preach the gospel at all times; If necessary, use words
-st. francis of assisi
lender.occupational_info: I am full-time college student & I take care of children in my home while their mothers are at work.

lender.name: Robert Easter
lender.loan_because: I saw an article of TV about Kiva and decided I had to be a part of this amazing movement to invest in the future of those who need it most. To be able to help someone help themselves is much more worth while to me.

lender.name: marty
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better living to be able to provide for their families.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I recycle electronics in an environmentally safe way in San Diego, California, USA.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Its the right way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I raise horses and alfalfa and grass hay.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Yumi
lender.loan_because: I have the capability and the funds to improve someone else's life --in both a constructive and responsible way. Kiva makes it easy to give the impoverished an opportunity to better provide for their family. And I am happy to loan.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a way to give back and make a difference

lender.name: Kim and Jerry
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: i love it! what a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: massage therapist

lender.name: Lazette
lender.loan_because: I believe God blesses me to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the care and support of children

lender.name: GREG
lender.loan_because: Give others a chance to benefit themselves where they might not otherwise have the opportunity.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: Its great to help others.

lender.name: Jin-Hong
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma. I am grateful that when I was in need of money, I got help from every corner. It is time for me to do the same as a gesture of showing my gratification to the universe.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Traditional Chinese medical practitioner. I treat people with acupuncture, herbs, cupping, gua sha and other modalities.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to make some kind of positive difference in this world. Globally, we all need each other.
lender.occupational_info: It's not about me.....:)

lender.name: Tayna Fulmer
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to help other women that are working to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technology company managing a team of people that handles our department's business plan and financial budgets.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because:
1 Jn 3:17 "If someone who has worldly means sees a brother in need and refuses him compassion, how can the love of God remain in him?" (NAB)
Mt 5:42 "Give to the one who asks of you, and do not turn your back on one who wants to borrow." (NAB)

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and this is really a fun way to do just that!
lender.occupational_info: I perform all types of accounting, auditing, and income tax return preparation.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: It is a smart way to give back. I also have a deep love for South America and like to connect myself to it whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I develop a program to help refugee children succeed in school.

lender.name: Domio
lender.occupation: Retired from corporate/now working with children.
lender.loan_because: we are one world and we must reach out to help one another. I am very grateful that I can be a participant in this teriffic program.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the corporate world, however, I continue to work with elementary students.

lender.name: Greg
lender.occupation: Small town policy maker and legal advocate.
lender.loan_because: foreign investment builds trust, grows wealth, and prevents war.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people hurt in accidents on their jobs in Colorado, USA. I also intend to work in central America building water projects to reduce infant mortality and give adults more time for family and industry and less for worry and walking.

lender.name: Matt Armstrong
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner and know how hard it can be to raise the capital needed. Best of Luck!
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur just like them.

lender.name: The King Family
lender.loan_because: Our family feels it is important to help others for we have been blessed. Happiness is in giving not receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I protect and grow my clients money so they can retire and never have to work again.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better and happier place one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I write books (manuals) telling people how to use computer software products (programs).

lender.name: Christa and Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be successful.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to help people both financially and by introducing them to technology that will enhance their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I invent practical energy saving technology for myself; then share the knowledge so that others can benefit too.

lender.name: Karen & Wayne
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Trip & Lacey
lender.loan_because: I have had a very successful life and want to help change the lives of those that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I over see the day to day operations of a large construction company.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I've always donated my time to causes, and this time, its great to participate and help somone else's dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: Artist, Humanitarian, docent at the zoo, participate in projects that effect the world and planet.

lender.name: kfir
lender.loan_because: this is a direct, simple and efficent way to help people who want to help themselves!!
lender.occupational_info: real estate

lender.name: Tenaj
lender.loan_because: Kiva is living one of my dreams! ‚Äì giving a hand-up to entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: My work is to inspire and shepherd authenticity, playfulness, and the reach for higher aims. (I think of it as Big-ing People Up!)

lender.name: Carice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Business owner.

lender.name: Florida Family
lender.loan_because: Other's have done so much for us.

lender.name: Farida
lender.loan_because: wanting to make changes in others

lender.name: WILLIAM
lender.loan_because: So little can do so much!

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I find it empowering to help individuals in other parts of the world provide for their families and succeed in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive administrative assistant. I answer phones, make appointments, pay invoices, type letters, and anything else that is required of me to make the office run smoothly.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: the best way to help people is to help them to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that helps engineers choose which materials to use in the products they design.

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Ms. Halls Class
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others to become independent and productive.
lender.occupational_info: We come from all over the world and are together in a classroom in the United States. Some of us come from the same places as the people to whom we loan. We are proud to serve as citizens of the world.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I am an entrepreneur and so is my company. The loans I have made around the world have all been repaid....so pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that is improving the quality of life of patients who suffer from chronic sinus problems. We have created a technology called Balloon Sinuplasty.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world needs more small/personal businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I provide accounting, organization and business strategy services to small entrepreneurs and businesses.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I saw Oprah Winfrey and was inspired by listening to the founders of Kiva. I think this is a great way to help people and I am thrilled to be apart of it.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: God blesses us to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Doctors talk, I type.

lender.name: Kathe
lender.loan_because: I can do my part to help change someone's life,
lender.occupational_info: I own a restaurant and sell food

lender.name: Steve and Anne
lender.loan_because: Jesus gave the ultimate gift to save us from our sins, and we want to give what we have to others in gratitude to Him.
lender.occupational_info: We are learning to perform general surgery and eye surgery and to take care of sick patients.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: My contributions can make a difference to one person at a time.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I'm just trying to help, in my own small way, to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Canadian broadcaster.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want others in the world to have a opportunity to build a better future for themselves and their children. I hope I can bring a small measure of happiness to someone else.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I know the difference that Givers have made in my life, and if I can do that for someone else, my time on earth is a little better spent.
lender.occupational_info: I am actually paid to dance! I trained to be a professional ballet dancer, and lucked out making it in the field. Everyday we train, we rehearse, and we perform. It is a blessing to be able to do what I love.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to earn money. I know the importance of how money can make a difference to people's hopes and dreams. I hoping that giving this gift to someone in need will stop poverty, hunger and miss opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am hired to design calendars, magazines, brochures, posters, post cards, labels, packaging, business cards, etc.

lender.name: Eric & Pam
lender.loan_because: we can change the world one person at a time.

lender.name: www.ClayBourg.com
lender.loan_because:
We believe in paying forward rather than paying back. Interest free micro-loans are the water on these entrepreneurs money trees.
Helping entrepreneurs is a great way to improve local standards of living without really assisting but rather empowering the people and helping them to be proud of their accomplishments.
lender.occupational_info:
We created Claybourg International, LLC to bring to the US market beautiful and rare French clay cookware and French fine art, sculptures and paintings.
Our 100% handcrafted and hand-painted clay cookware make French cooking easy, healthy and great tasting. We provide free healthy traditional French cuisine recipes.
The ClayBourg Art Gallery sells in exclusivity the work of art of young and established French artists, paintings, sculptures and art-deco items directly shipped from the artist in France to your home.
Also visit our blog @ www.TheHoplaSquare.com

lender.name: Rissa
lender.loan_because: Giving back something small is better than nothing at all :)

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to be able to help someone acheive a better life. It's at the heart of Christ's teachings.
lender.occupational_info: I care for the people who cared for and helped shape the person I became- the elderly of my community who now can no longer care for themselves and must live in a nursing facility.

lender.name: Suzanna
lender.loan_because: I am able to

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: My passion is to help others reach their goals. Everyone needs help and this is a perfect way to help others with no other resources.
lender.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time providing financial education. Our services are free as our goal is to help others reach their economic goals.

lender.name: Davis
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those in need.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help poeple

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe self-confidence comes from self-reliance. I want to support women who wish to pursue their dreams of financial stability for themselves and their families. I like to support educational ventures locally, as well as in developing nations that would help cultivate opportunities for leadership in women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate of the Organizational Behavior and Leadership program at University of San Francisco and work full-time as a manager for a team of field-based medical science liaisons in cardiovascular medicine for a pharmaceutical company. I am currently earning my Masters in Health Communication from Boston University. My background is as a Physician Assistant for heart surgeons.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an angel.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderfully easy and effective way to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Analyze United States health care policy for state government

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: it's important to share what we have when we are blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect wildlife and preserve the environment

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: sharing with others is the best way to improve my life.
lender.occupational_info: My "work" right now is to find more ways to get involved with the world around me.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because:
These small loans are something I can afford that will make such a big difference in the lives of the recipients. It's a great feeling to make a direct impact in someone's life!
Additionally, I hope that, in some small way, by receiving a helping hand from someone around the world, it will build a sense of peace and goodwill in the hearts of the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the web site of a non-profit international service and fellowship organization.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's nice to think of someone other than myself for a change.
lender.occupational_info: I sell engineered solutions. If you don't know how to get electricity to your business, I can figure it out for you.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I love business!
lender.occupational_info: I assist entrepreneurs with business start-up including business planning and financing.

lender.name: Lisa and Ron
lender.loan_because: We love to help people who are trying to help themselves. We have visited several of these great countries. The people are always warm and friendly.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I am just trying to do my part in making the world a better place. I worked in the business world before staying at home with my son and I think that Kiva is a fantastic organization to become a part of.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the whole world, staying home with my baby boy!

lender.name: Greg and Angela Bannon
lender.loan_because: It just makes good sense!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to support themselves and in return help the community around them.

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: I recently traveled to Tanzania, Africa on vacation. It's a beautiful country with beautiful people but the people are in need of so much. Water is scarse, the basics of life are hard to come by. I loan because I've seen the need and know my dollars can help.

lender.name: Richard & Helga
lender.loan_because: In some small way we hope to make someone's life better and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation has ranged from microwave communications systems, instrumentation systems and currently as a hardware maintenance technician, primarily on unix servers.

lender.name: Lola
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to make a HUGE difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to by-pass banks and money lenders and help get industrious people off the ground. It helps them, their families,their communities and their country. Therefore it makes the world a better place one small step at a time. The loan is not lost in some great big charity. It is tracked, returned and can be passed on to another deserving person. I love the idea of being able to know exactly where my money is going, whom it is serving, and how that person is doing.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher. I taught french, and later took a position teaching grade three and four. I liked children of that age. Now I am retired and look after my house and garden.

lender.name: Jaspher
lender.loan_because: It is great to help others with achieving there goals.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: my money goes directly to the people who need it. I feel good knowing that my loan improves someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I lead a group of talented and dedicated people who help others build their personal brand

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I can. I always like to hear about the successes of individuals helping others and just being able to survive.
lender.occupational_info: Selling pre-engineering wood roof trusses to customers so that they can build homes and buildings for their customers; alot of phone and computer work.

lender.name: Andrea, Jason & Arnold
lender.loan_because: If I can help others on the other side of this world...then maybe one day they might also be able to help someone!
lender.occupational_info: I am my own my own business called 'The Waxing Studio' We do Eyebrow Artistiry, Full Body Waxing & Facial Skin Care. (716)741-2201

lender.name: Vernon
lender.occupation: At home full time dad to 1 daughter
lender.loan_because: I am loaning this in hopes of helping this famiy to make thier bussiness grow and become more than it is now. Also because people in my life have given me so much including a new lease on life, so I make these loan to give the same chance to other familes
lender.occupational_info: Utterly rewarding. There is no better job in this entire world.

lender.name: Giampaglia Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is very fortunate to be able to loan to others in need. We enjoy knowing we can help improve their lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Transportation company in the Northeast

lender.name: Billie
lender.loan_because: I'm on a limited income but found that even my small amount can help improve someone's life. And shouldn't that be what it's all about?

lender.name: Garth Wintle
lender.loan_because: Because someone is in need and i can provide that need
lender.occupational_info: Plan activities to fight forest fires across the western portion of Ontario Canada

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and your abundance is my abundance. It feels good to give. It creates a healing experience that starts a cycle of goodness for everyone involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that helps supply needy moms with essential baby items.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: Being able to do this is gift for people like me who can't find time to do more...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that designs web sites and creates really cool online advertising

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: this is a way for me to give something back, to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired social worker. I now do volunteer work in a Telephone Bereavement Support Program.

lender.name: Lee
lender.occupational_info: Our non-profit El Sol Day Labor Center offers job placement, breakfast and lunch, and English and computer classes 7 days a week.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It's hard enough to become successful under the best of circumstances. It gives me great satisfaction to help other women not as fortunate as I have been.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agricultural company that helps to restore and maintain native erosion control in California.

lender.name: Shirl
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference!!!

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I'm so happy to see individuals and their families working to make their lives successful, if I can be of help "GREAT"
lender.occupational_info: My company provides pension and benefits for First Nation employers. Approximately 7000 individuals are presently participating in our plans

lender.name: ROBIN
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I am the parts manager for a Honda dealership. I manage the parts inventory, parts ordering, receipting of parts and all other aspects of my department.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: a little bit makes a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees at my organization understand their health insurance and other benefits.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: It helps me keep things in perspecive and maybe what I give will make someone else's life just a little bit better.

lender.name: Ovid
lender.loan_because: 'Giving is Receiving' and no other feeling matches it!

lender.name: Ken Jordan
lender.loan_because: it takes very little to sponsor a business in the developing world and giving in this way really helps make a difference, even if in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides credit cards to consumers and businesses.

lender.name: Paula J
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help those who are trying to help themselves. Also, KIVA allows me to be able to afford to help.

lender.name: Dominick Martino
lender.loan_because: I am thankful everyday to be blessed with good health, and to have lived a life without poverty. Nothing is more rewarding to me than helping those who need that one break that may change their lives forever. I hope to keep doing this for a long time. Thanks KIVA.

lender.name: Deann
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Chris & Karen
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Artist. We sell giclee prints of original artwork.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: i want to help small business people in need.
lender.occupational_info: i sell custom made furniture

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: Because it needs to be done.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I loan because others have helped me when I was in need and because I am able! I loan because I care and because I want my life to contribute something to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit oraganization that runs after school programs for at-risk youth.

lender.name: Art, Miyuki & Jason
lender.loan_because: Just a chance to help make a difference. "Just give peace a chance"

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: This just seems like a great idea to me. Helping hard working people around the world who need a hand-up not a hand-out. It makes me feel good to know that in some small way I am able to help people improve their lives.

lender.name: Mike N SA
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Just a hard working guy, able to lend a helping hand. No more, no less.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me start a business...it's pay it forward time, with gratefulness.

lender.name: Yvon
lender.loan_because: I am home due to disability. Instead of donating money directly I make giftwraps that I sell. That way I use my money to generate even more money to spend on Kiva, where I spend all of the proceeds. It means a lot to me because that way I still feel useful, spending my time to help this goal that I believe in.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: To help others pusue their dreams.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I need to take some responsibility in this world to make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I hobby all the time now. I make stain glass windows, floor cloths, and sew (all for fun) and give most of the things away.

lender.name: JO
lender.loan_because: i want to help others.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.occupational_info: I teach business education, career planning and health to students in grades 8 - 12 at a small high school in Castlegar, BC.

lender.name: Radha
lender.loan_because: My goal is to help transform women's life in every part of the world.Owning a business is very empowering to these women who have the willingness to make a difference in their lives and that of their families and community.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I hope the small amount I give can make a big difference in other peoples' lives.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle for every penny you need.
lender.occupational_info: I sell gifts to tourists.

lender.name: Jordana
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help someone else when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be able to stay home with my daughter and take care of her.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: The best charitable donation is helping those who are eager to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Volunteering help is one of the greatest joys in the world.
To live selfishly is not to live at all !

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I really admire these people for starting their own businesses, as I'd like to do the same one day.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime.

lender.name: TheLaughingCat
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to realize their own dreams, and we are grateful to be able to help others do so.
lender.occupational_info: We paint, write, and homestead, and we live self directed, inner directed lives, and we encourage others who wish to do so in their own ways.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give women in other parts to the world hope and the opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Toshiba selling laptop computers to businesses.

lender.name: Monseigneur Robert
lender.loan_because: Noblesse oblige requires me to do the right thing and give a little assistance when I am able to do so.

lender.name: Mona Fimreite
lender.loan_because: Because it feels good to help! :)

lender.name: Cassandra & Stephan
lender.loan_because: I want to support the people who are out there trying to make a difference for themselves and working to improve their lives!

lender.name: Hallstein
lender.loan_because: I can do some difference to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am driving trailers around Europe

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: it's about time for me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I teach student nurses in the classroom and community.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. I appreciate the willingness to work hard and I want to help those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a computer department for a community college.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want people in other countries to have everything I do. I like loaning to people who are trying to help people learn, bookstores, schools,etc.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to start a charity to raise money to build wells in Africa. I a the "main" founder, but I do have two friends who are my co-founders. We are trying to launch a website and have decided on the name ''Change the Water".

lender.name: andrea
lender.occupational_info: I am a sign language interpreter fluent in Spanish, English and American Sign Language would like to travel to a school for the deaf in Dominican Republic with a documenting and volunteering /donating time and resources to the school for the Deaf in Barahona ( south west DR). Structural renovations, clean drinking water and electricity are desperately needed in the 3 rd world country. People with disabilities have little or no access on this island of Hispaniola. Education for deaf children are well reflected of the lack of working individual with disabilities.Money is desperately needed to keep this school running and deaf children educated. Monies are also needed as well as time/hours observing/learning visual/linguistic standards for communications.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have needed help in the past and may again. I believe you reap what you sow, so when you put yourself in someone-elses shoes the answer is easy! I also want to help make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: Parenting, fishing, Church, sports in general, biking, running, reading, writing and studies.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and I have seen first hand what a buisiness can do for a indivual and a community. I just want to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: Handouts are only a temporary solution. Loaning people capital allows people to build a foundation for future independence, both personally and within their nation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a currently a Political Science student at Oregon State University.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people improve their business, and learning about their work.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: How can we expect to live in a better world if we do nothing but expect...

lender.name: Hilary
lender.occupation: Executive Director, Education Outside the Box

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: building scaffolding, carrying cinder blocks/bricks for the brick layers.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: We are called to love others more than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with schools helping them determine what types of training and materials teachers and students need.

lender.name: EscapeMaker.com
lender.loan_because: Without loans and support of people who believed in me over the years, I would not have started or developed my own business.
lender.occupational_info: EscapeMaker.com is a guide to weekend leisure trips within a day's drive or train ride of New York City.

lender.name: JULIE
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the whole world. I get to do what I love every day.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's such a wonderful feeling to help others and, with Kiva, it's so easy to do. I can give while sitting at my desk and I leave work knowing I've helped someone today.
lender.occupational_info: I buy homes from people who need to sell and then I help people who can't get bank loans move into wonderful homes that I help them eventually be able to buy.

lender.name: Rise
lender.loan_because: I think that it is wonderful to be able to help someone trying to help themselves. This way I can do it over and over.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: My contribution changes futures, empowers human beings and allows me the privilege of loaning the same money over and over again.

lender.name: casie
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to give others opportunities that they may not otherwise have. I love that these people are asking for modest amounts that can make HUGE differences in their and their families lives.

lender.name: My Luu
lender.loan_because: It's our responsibility as global citizens to help those in underserved communities become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I lead market development for IBM's Human Ability & Accessibility Center, which develops and offers technology solutions to improve the lives of people with disabilities or low literacy as well as those in maturing populations.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves an opportunity to better their own life. The traditional banking model doesn't help underprivileged people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps other companies make electronic domestic and international vendor payments, control foreign exchange risk and consolidate payment systems.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I loan because you have made it so easy for me to make a direct and real difference in someone's life. I feel lucky to be able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a residential real estate company in a small town in suburban New York City.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people speak better.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to enhance their lives and seeing that change come into fruition are my joy.
lender.occupational_info: I do the legal work to help businesses make their ideas become reality.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my 5 month old son.

lender.name: Margery
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe in Paying it Forward. Someone helped me one day. Its my turn.

lender.name: Naree
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone can be an entrepreneur when given the opportunity

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to become involved in global issues and helping people in other countries who are trying to be self-sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the helping business as a minister and enjoy helping people around me and in other countries as well.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying forward.
lender.occupational_info: I run the computer department for company with 80 branches nationwide. Hardware and software.

lender.name: jodie
lender.loan_because: every human should be given a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain and make people laugh

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I think it is fantastic to see what people working together can accomplish. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are physically or medically challenged. I love my job!

lender.name: David & Jessica
lender.loan_because: We know how important it is to have people who believe in you. It is important to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: David provides technical equipment support to people around the world. Jessica works at a hospital, helping patients.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: ... while I am not wealthy monetarily, I have been blessed with a rich life. The least I can do is loan a few dollars to someone who is trying to begin or grow a business. They inspire me. And, selfishly, it makes me feel good to do something for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Sometimes, I write stories for newspapers. Sometimes, I work on a screenplay (maybe one day it will become an actual movie). Sometimes, I just write on my blog, just to write. My "job" is as an editor for an IT consulting company. It's terribly dull! : o )

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to other women as I have been fortunate enough to have financial help after cancer
lender.occupational_info: I make healthy food that taste wonderful

lender.name: Dionisia
lender.loan_because: all it take is one person to change the life of another person, and it doesn't always have to be with money, though this time it does and I am glad to be helping a woman make a better life for herself and her family. "Pass it on" that little favor you do for someone comes back a thousand fold.
lender.occupational_info: I used to build equipment for special need children, children with physical disabilities, a carpenter I guess. I am retired now, but it was a wonderful job.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: for anyone who has given me a hand, I want to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: i help to keep people safe from poisons

lender.name: dj.jobim
lender.loan_because:
Last year, when I was at the lowest I could ever be, I had $6.35 left in my bank account. I had 3 days to suffice on that, and even worse is that I was living in New York City! I had to make a choice for that $6.35: do I keep it for a Metrocard or do I get a loaf of bread to last me through the next 3 days? I finally decided on the subway ticket.
A dear friend of mine discovered about my condition and without hesitation, he lent me a gracious amount of money on the stipulation that I only pay him once I am financially secure again. I never can forget that.
It's been a year since that critical, yet highly challenging phase of my life. I have been thoroughly blessed ever since and that is why I am here. Because I know how it feels like to be on their side of the fence. And believe me, it's a really thin line between making or breaking one completely.
So now, it's my time to extend that "lending" hand and hopefully give someone facing an uphill battle a winning edge. But in the end, I still believe I am the one who gets the most of out it =)
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent filmmaker who would rather invest in good stories of everyday people than with mutual funds and 401Ks.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Talk to people and find out what kinds of products and services they want.

lender.name: ~Peace~
lender.loan_because: Its a beautiful thing, to help someone else.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I love to support fellow business owners.

lender.name: Rick & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: WE want to help for a simple reason...it is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Rick is retired from two careers and now remodels old homes. Cheryl is an investment representative.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting women-owned businesses around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We fix computers and build websites.

lender.name: machine
lender.loan_because: we believe in people

lender.name: Monique & Greg
lender.loan_because:
By changing one persons life you affect an entire family, community and one day the world!
To give to others is the greatest gift you can give yourself!

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for people to reach their fullest potential.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and familes to assist them in creating more possibilites for living successfully.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help others help themselves and thereby preserve their dignity and pride.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals

lender.name: Cosette
lender.loan_because: sharing resources changes lives, inspires hope, and grows the future.
lender.occupational_info: I offer supportive counseling and coaching to children, youth and families seeking to change the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because:
To Whom much is given, much is required.
I am blessed to live in such an amazing country with so many opportunities. I realize not everyone has the same lifestyle that I enjoy and I feel that it is my responsibility to share what I have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the logistics industry, aiding in the transportation of goods all over the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: helping people's lives improve is a powerful thing...
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 4 wonderful, unique and inspiring healthy children.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: People that work hard should be supported.
lender.occupational_info: I write and perform comedy on stage and on TV.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I can and I care
lender.occupational_info: My work is rewarding. I enjoy helping people from all walks of life.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference and here's a great way to do it!

lender.name: Leslie and Maria
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to support women who are trying to support themselves and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Leslie is a second grade teacher in a public school, she teaches seven and eight year old children. Maria works in a lab as a research assistant at a university.

lender.name: Ben
lender.occupational_info: Ben works with a company developing open source healthcare software for hospitals.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want women around the world to have more opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers how to work with students from other countries.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I firmly beleive in and support those who work to make life positive for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to have a department that helps the general managers in our company to run their business as efficiently as possible for their customers

lender.name: Jesus
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible to invest in Dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for providing engineering support for the construction of offshore oil & natural gas exploration platforms. These inlcude jackups, semi-submersibles & Ships.

lender.name: Doni
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with foreign students and study abroad.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: It's great to see how such a few dollars can make such a big difference insomeone's life.

lender.name: Sabina
lender.occupation: Plant/bonsai nursery, plant design, plant art
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world who are not as fortunate as we are.
lender.occupational_info: Creative, satisfying, love meeting new people every day, love plants and art

lender.name: Yuliya
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance and Everybody has the right to be happy .

lender.name: Humm
lender.occupational_info: I assist women in childbirth.

lender.name: Harold & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We care for those that are struggling and trying to make a difference in their lives...
lender.occupational_info: My husband is retired and works around our farm, I work in a local Garden Centre that sells flowers & garden vegetables(annuals & perennials) for gardeners in Ontario ,Canada

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: life is about giving and loving all your neighbours and friends.

lender.name: sherry
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I think Kiva is a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a nursing home, caring for elderly people. I love my job and have worked there for 25 years.

lender.name: Thanh & Suyin
lender.loan_because: it makes this world better

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I loan as a means of providing encouragement to hard working people who are striving to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with county government and not for profit agencies to develop programs which assist individuals struggling with chemical dependency, mental illness and developmental disabilities

lender.name: kia
lender.loan_because: maybe it will have a positive impact on someone's life.........
lender.occupational_info: My work is in a nursing home with veterans (men and women) who have served in the military.

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I'd love to see people succeed in making their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Together with my 3 business partners we started our own real estate group to help people buy and sell real estate. We know how great it feels to work & support ourselves and our families.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: to be like Jesus and help others

lender.name: Dale and Brenda
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at one time or another in their lives. We believe that when you give, life gives back.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world community.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, the world is a small place, and I want to set a good example for my grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I teach maintaining and fixing mechanical and electronic equipment.

lender.name: lucine
lender.loan_because: I can't get further than this. I don't know how to get to pay pal to do the $100. loan by credit card. I am trying to make the loan to Lemoe Aliielua in Samoa

lender.name: Kibby
lender.loan_because: There's a lot of decent, hardworking folks trying to get by in a rough world. They deserve a break.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.

lender.name: Amy & Emily
lender.loan_because: It does my heart good...and it's a great way to teach my daughter to share.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I have been looking for a meaningful way to contribute to something that will make a difference. I am inspired by the motivation of those on Kiva working to make their own world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people who have special needs. I primarily teach reading. It is very fulfilling to help my students to live more successful and happier lives.

lender.name: SimpleFullLife
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone having opportunity to improve their lives, despite repressive global politics and multi-national corporations that marginalize and externalize people's fates
lender.occupational_info: In my chosen technical profession that I love, I try to contribute to technology that can reduce our demand for energy and goods. Hopefully this helps the lives of people all around the world

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: These are the people that are doing so much for their local communities; but, even talent and hard work sometimes needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain databases.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I spent time traveling to third world countries and have seen first hand what a difference a small contribution can make.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the mental health field. I work with young children with developmental disorders.

lender.name: Ken, Noah and Montie
lender.loan_because: We are all in this TOGETHER! Next door, or across the world. "You're my brother, you're my sister, so take me by the hand..."
lender.occupational_info: I work in a casino, standing at a counter and doing my best to service the guests.

lender.name: madaline
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much! I was fortunate to be born and live in the USA, and, tho I work hard for it, I have so much, and I believe one reason we are on this earth is to help each other. It is a wonderful feeling to help someone, I receive so much back when I do so.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: i love seeing people doing their own thing!

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: a little bit of money can change someone's life

lender.name: Bob & Carla
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and want to share with others.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I love ingenuity. The idea behind Kiva is innovative and I truly believe it is making the world a better place. "If everyone did this" just imagine...
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and spend most of my day analyzing the costs to run a business.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people in the world a chance to make their lives better and to help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office of a school.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime in their lives. Because I am fortunate enough to be able to help.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Joanna & Chris
lender.loan_because: We want to contribute to something bigger than ourselves!
lender.occupational_info:
We are both teachers. Chris teaches science at Lancaster High School, and I (Joanna) teach World Religions & Social Justice at Sacred Heart Academy, a Catholic all-girls school in Buffalo, NY. We love our work!
Please check out Joanna's website to see how Kiva has been used in the classroom!

lender.name: Raquel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other peoples lives. I have been blessed with a beautiful family and a good life. The least I can do is share my blessings with others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very creative, stressful at times but overall fullfilling. I enjoy what I do for a living and some day will like to have my own business and be more creative.

lender.name: Jolene for Jesus
lender.loan_because: of Jesus' love. May God continue to bless you.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring

lender.name: Lewis & Sandra
lender.loan_because: We have a little more than we need, and would like for more people to at least be able to meet their needs.
lender.occupational_info: Life has opportunities for those who seek.

lender.name: Ivana
lender.loan_because: we are one

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: It feels good. i have been blessed, and this is a great way to give back and help someone to help themself
lender.occupational_info: i work in the public finance field. I raise money to finance schools, hospitals, etc.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because:
This poem reminds me that even though I cannot do much, I can do something. And when many collectively do something it can have a meaningful effect in the world.
A Pebble
James W. Foley (1847-1939)
Drop a pebble in the water: Just a splash, and its gone; But there's half-a-hundred ripples Circling on and on, Spreading, spreading from the center Flowing on out to the sea. And there is no way of telling Where the end is going to be.
Drop a pebble in the water: In a minute you forget, But here's little waves a flowing, And there's ripples circling yet, And those little waves a flowing To a great big wave have grown; You've disturbed a mighty river Just by dropping in a stone.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I loan because some one cared enough to provide loans and grants for low income students and these grants made it possible for me and others like me to become a Registered Nurses when we had no money for school.
lender.occupational_info: I am the charge nurse for a wonder group of Nurses. I responsible for making sure the unit runs smoothly at night and that the patients receive the care that they need to heal and recover from open heart surgery or heart related illness. Serving Nurses and Patients is the greatest job ever!

lender.name: Cris
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that I can help someone hopefully fulfill their dream.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the magazines & books in Stores. I also clean other peoples houses 2 days a week.

lender.name: Steve & Lorie
lender.loan_because: We feel blessed and want to help. Having an impact on many lives is what Kiva is allowing us to be part of and something we share with our kids and family. We've made it a family function to discuss who we want to help and "why" we are helping someone. It's made a huge impact in their lives and ours.
lender.occupational_info: My company manages, on a global level, the transportation of goods from one country to another.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help people help themselves. We believe in and support entreprenuership around the world.

lender.name: Hendrikus
lender.loan_because: I feel good when I give
lender.occupational_info: I used to test software to ensure its quality and safety

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: We are all blessed with opportunities in life and this is ours.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be or become what they want. Giving helps them get there just that much faster. It makes me feel good. There is nothing like having your own.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the customer service arena of my own. Sometimes we all just need a little help and a helping hand.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine not helping someone in need. I am very thankful for everything we have and giving is a way to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are sick and dying. We help them to stay at home and live as much as they can.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: it is in my heart to help others in any way I possibly can.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of other people. I want to share what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a class of third and fourth grade students (8-10 yrs old).

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: of a number of reasons, but I am headed to Nairobi this summer for a mission trip and hope to meet my Kiva friends.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 9th grade student.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: A 76 year old homemaker. Mother of three. Grandmother of four.

lender.name: Paula and Franco
lender.loan_because: we love the idea of being able to help individuals around the world to become self-sufficient. We have been disheartened to see how our country's international reputation for goodwill has suffered in the last seven years. Kiva seems to be a perfect mechanism to repair some of that damage. We have made this a family affair by giving our sons gift certificates so that they too can experience the joy of philanthropy. Come Christmas, they will share with us the projects of their choice.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: There have been times in my life when I was in need and I can remember how wonderful it felt when someone would care enough to lend me a helping hand. I am at a time in my life now that I can be that helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency that builds roads.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help :)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant serving food and I also work as an artist: painting, sculpting, sewing and making new things from recycled objects.

lender.name: Bud
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission. It is absolutely a force for good. No interest loans are accepted world wide!
lender.occupational_info: Theater producer and business consultant

lender.name: Tee

lender.name: Lisa
